text: Hi! Are there any possibilities to know the specific line of code that causing the problems in the module? I'm trying to update a new module then suddenly I get an error. So I reverted it back to the version where it's working fine then it still doesn't work. Anyone there encountered the same problem before? Thanks!

Hi! Usually, in local development, you get more specific error message in case something goes wrong. My suggestion would be to try CLI

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli>
Any insights on styling field border? If with custom sides enabled. then how the output should look like? Does it render by default all borders or just selected border side? It seems glitch.
